ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 39
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The quest does not require you to smith anything.  You just get the mold as a prize.  It is a blade mold but does not work as smithing weapons has not been
ygData.messageBody:
> I heard that there was a quest where you are given a mold and you have to
> smith a weapon. Has anyone else heard about this and what smithing skill
> should we be at before we waste the mold by not being skillfull enough ?

The quest does not require you to smith anything. You just get the mold as
a prize. It is a blade mold but does not work as smithing weapons has not
been added to EQ.

> Also, does the studded leather armor have any magic properties or just a
> better armor class. Could we get an Enchanter to enchant the metal studs
> to do this ?

Studded leather is just that studded leather. It isn't magical. The only
thing enchanters are actually able to enchant now is metals to make jewelry
from. Perhaps when and if that class is ever finished then they could do
such things. Now however they can not.
